sentences.en: At the enchanted metropolitan twilight I felt a haunting loneliness sometimes.
sentences.cn: 在大都市迷人的黄昏时刻,我有时感到一种难以排遣的寂寞.

sentences.en: Hiding beneath this hilly area are the haunting Waitomo Glowworm Caves.
sentences.cn: 在这山地之中藏着让我无法忘怀的怀托摩萤火虫儿岩洞.

sentences.en: His sick heart lifted in the haunting eternity of the hills.
sentences.cn: 置身于他梦中萦绕的永恒的山中,他沉痛的心开朗起来.

sentences.en: It was sharp - a haunting cry.
sentences.cn: 这声音很刺耳,过后总是在耳边响.

sentences.en: Similarly, John Williams'haunting score beautifully accents the film.
sentences.cn: 同时, 约翰·威廉姆斯的萦绕心头的动人乐曲为影片增色不少.

sentences.en: That concern is haunting the European Central Bank ( ECB ).
sentences.cn: 这一担忧正困扰着欧洲央行 ( ECB ).

sentences.en: That haunting episode of bygone days was to her mother but a passing accident.
sentences.cn: 那件日夜盘据在她心头的住事,对于她母亲不过是一件过眼云烟的偶然事件罢了.

sentences.en: The carol has a primitive strength and haunting simplicity.
sentences.cn: 这首颂歌有一种原始的力量和令人难忘的纯朴.

sentences.en: The cathedral organ and the distant voices have a haunting beauty.
sentences.cn: 大教堂的风琴和遥远的回音产生一种不易忘怀的美丽.

sentences.en: The dreadful , haunting fear of nuclear warfare casts a sobering pall over all international relations.
sentences.cn: 经常出现的对于核战争的恐惧在一切国际关系上投下了一道愁人的阴影.

sentences.en: The film's haunting musical theme stayed in my head for days.
sentences.cn: 那部电影挥之不去的主题旋律多日来萦绕于我的脑际.

sentences.en: The tune had been haunting London for weeks past.
sentences.cn: 这只歌子在伦敦已经流行了好几个星期了.

sentences.en: There is no denying that the specter of unemployment and want is constantly haunting them.
sentences.cn: 失业和贫乏的幽灵一直在对他们作祟是不能否认的.

sentences.en: There is no denying that the spectre of unemployment and want is constantly haunting them.
sentences.cn: 失业和匮乏的幽灵一直在对他们作祟是不能否认的.

sentences.en: Your departure from the earth is haunting you, it's haunting you.
sentences.cn: 你的成长经历, 它时常浮现,时常浮现.

words.tran_cn: 闹鬼的；反复出现的；受到困扰的
常去；缠住；使担忧（haunt的过去式和过去分词）
常出没于…；萦绕于…；经常去…

trans.tran_cn: 萦绕心头的，不易忘怀的，无法甩脱的，给人以强烈感受的
trans.tran_en: sad but also beautiful and staying in your thoughts for a long time

trans.tran_cn: 常去；缠住某人；萦绕在…心中（haunt的ing形式）
